title: Xbox Coming to TV, Making a Streaming Device - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.10.21
description:
There are like 900 Xbox stories so, Greg is joined by Andy Cortez, SnowBikeMike, and Parris Lilly to talk about xCloud, streaming devices, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:30 - Housekeeping

t’s E3 WEEK; CAN YOU BELIEVE IT?! The general idea is that we’re reacting to ALMOST everything. So if it’s happening, check out twitch.tv/kindafunnygames.

Thursday, it starts with Summer Games Fest Kickoff at 11 am PT.

This means that all your favorite shows are getting jumbled and happening around E3, so stay tuned.

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness & Black Jack

The Roper Report -
00:08:11 - Xbox and Xbox Game Pass are Coming to More Screens
00:17:38 - BUT Xbox is still making consoles, Wesley Yin-Poole @ Eurogamer…
00:32:59 - Ad  
00:37:35 - Phil’s subtle PlayStation Shade, Joe Skrebbels @ IGN
00:52:20 - Out today
00:55:22 - Squad Up:Theo John(PSN) - TheLegendofTheo
00:57:15 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Greg
